text: sum te'o'e joyum nathi ke te'othi pahela ame ketalaya juthone nasta kari cukaya chi'e, je'one ame duniyamam evi sakti api hati jevi sakti tamane nathi api ane ame te'o para musaladhara varasada varasavyo ane ame te'oni nicethi nahero vaheti kari didhi, pachi ame te'one, te'ona papona karane nasta kari didha ane te'o pachi bija juthone peda kari didha
